title: Diabetes Patient Empowerment Program for Insulin Management Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Training for in-service professionals focused on insulin administration and blood glucose monitoring, integrating self-directed learning and group collaboration using personal devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform insulin dose calculation and administration procedures for diabetic patients with 90% accuracy.
Learners can interpret blood glucose monitoring data to develop dietary adjustment plans.
Learners can reduce judgment errors in emergency situations by 50% using a structured protocol based on cognitive load theory.
Learners can create a standardized insulin management manual through peer feedback and case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
